jobDescription: DescriptionThe Silicon development team is looking for a leader in Xilinx, for the verification of next generation DSP processors in SiliconResponsibilities include the following:· Will be leading a small team of verification engineers in Xilinx, and work with a cross geographic team to verify a next generation DSP architecture in Silicon· Work with Architecture, design and software teams to drive the verification of the next generation DSP processors· Develop different verification platforms in SystemC/System Verilog including utilization of Emulation/Prototyping platforms for verifying next generation multi-core DSP designs· Verify the architecture and performance of the design· Work with Architecture and Software teams to ensure micro-architecture and design is fully verified/validated across multiple platforms· Responsible for a comprehensive verification plan and drive the implementation of verification test cases from applications and other sourcesQualifications:Masters in electrical or computer engineering10+ total of which 4+ years of experience in the verification of CPU/Video/DSP/vector processors, SIMD, etc.Experience in specifying and developing the verification infrastructure for verifying CPU/DSP/Vector-datapath designsStrong foundation in SoC architecture and verification of multi-core processors including SIMD, Vector processors, floating point, etc. is a plusStrong analytical problem solving, and attention to detailStrong experience in HDL, verification, and general computational logic design/verification conceptsExpertise in Verilog/System Verilog, C/C++/SystemC, UVM, Scripting languages like Perl/Python, etc.Excellent written and verbal communication skillsExcellent interpersonal skills, self-motivated
